node.title: The COVID 19 Crisis - Agriculture and the Endtimes
node.description: Pastor Darren Greenfield, Farm Manager at Weimar Institute, and Chairman of the Board of Adventist Agricultural Association (AdAgra) gives a important message of how we can prepare for the end of time for ourselves and our families. The COVID pandemic is a small taste of what the trials ahead are going to be like when we cannot provide food for our families.
